NSIS 可下载 HM NIS Edit 插件，进行图形化创建脚本。

示例：

```nsis
; Script generated by the HM NIS Edit Script Wizard.

; HM NIS Edit Wizard helper defines
!define PRODUCT_NAME "畅写文档"
; !define PRODUCT_VERSION "1.0.1"
!define PRODUCT_PUBLISHER "UnionTech, Inc."
!define PRODUCT_WEB_SITE "http://cx.uniontech.com"
!define PRODUCT_DIR_REGKEY "Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\App Paths\cxClientX.exe"
!define PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY "Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\${PRODUCT_NAME}"
!define PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY "HKLM"
!define COMPANY_NAME "UnionTech"
!define APP "src\cxClientX.exe"

; MUI 1.67 compatible ------
!include "MUI2.nsh"

; MUI Settings
; install uninstall ico
!define MUI_ABORTWARNING
!define MUI_ICON "logo.ico"
!define MUI_UNICON "logo.ico"

!define MUI_HEADERIMAGE
!define MUI_HEADERIMAGE_BITMAP "logohead.bmp"
!define MUI_WELCOMEFINISHPAGE_BITMAP "banner_min.bmp"


; Welcome page
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_WELCOME
; License page
; !define MUI_LICENSEPAGE_RADIOBUTTONS
!define MUI_LICENSEPAGE_CHECKBOX
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_LICENSE "Licence.txt"
; Directory page
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_DIRECTORY
; Instfiles page
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_INSTFILES
; Finish page
!define MUI_FINISHPAGE_RUN "$INSTDIR\cxClientX.exe"
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_FINISH

; Uninstaller pages
!insertmacro MUI_UNPAGE_INSTFILES

; Language files
!insertmacro MUI_LANGUAGE "SimpChinese"

; MUI end ------

;--------------------------------
;Version Information
!getdllversion "${APP}" ver 
!define PRODUCT_VERSION "${ver1}.${ver2}.${ver3}.${ver4}" 
VIProductVersion "${PRODUCT_VERSION}" 
VIAddVersionKey "FileVersion" "${PRODUCT_VERSION}" 
VIAddVersionKey "ProductVersion" "${PRODUCT_VERSION}" 
VIAddVersionKey /LANG=2052 "ProductName" "${PRODUCT_NAME}"
VIAddVersionKey /LANG=2052 "CompanyName" "${COMPANY_NAME}"
VIAddVersionKey /LANG=2052 "LegalCopyright" "Copyright UnionTech company"
; VIAddVersionKey "LegalCopyright" "http://nsis.sf.net/License"
VIAddVersionKey /LANG=2052 "FileDescription" "${PRODUCT_NAME}"
;--------------------------------

;--------------------------------
Name "${PRODUCT_NAME}"
OutFile "${PRODUCT_NAME}_${PRODUCT_VERSION}_x64.exe"
InstallDir "$PROGRAMFILES64\畅写文档"
InstallDirRegKey HKLM "${PRODUCT_DIR_REGKEY}" ""
ShowInstDetails show
ShowUnInstDetails show
;--------------------------------

Section "MainSection" SEC01
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR"
  SetOverwrite try
  File "src\cxClientX.exe"
  CreateDirectory "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档"
  CreateShortCut "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\畅写文档.lnk" "$INSTDIR\cxClientX.exe"
  CreateShortCut "$DESKTOP\畅写文档.lnk" "$INSTDIR\cxClientX.exe"
  File "src\chrome_elf.dll"
  File "src\CefViewWing.exe"
  File "src\d3dcompiler_47.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\iconengines"
  File "src\iconengines\qsvgicon.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR"
  File "src\icudtl.dat"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\imageformats"
  File "src\imageformats\qgif.dll"
  File "src\imageformats\qicns.dll"
  File "src\imageformats\qico.dll"
  File "src\imageformats\qjpeg.dll"
  File "src\imageformats\qsvg.dll"
  File "src\imageformats\qtga.dll"
  File "src\imageformats\qtiff.dll"
  File "src\imageformats\qwbmp.dll"
  File "src\imageformats\qwebp.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR"
  File "src\libcef.dll"
  File "src\libEGL.dll"
  File "src\libGLESv2.dll"
  File "src\opengl32sw.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\platforms"
  File "src\platforms\qwindows.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR"
  File "src\Qt5Core.dll"
  File "src\Qt5Gui.dll"
  File "src\Qt5Svg.dll"
  File "src\Qt5Widgets.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\resources"
  File "src\resources\chrome_100_percent.pak"
  File "src\resources\chrome_200_percent.pak"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\resources\locales"
  File "src\resources\locales\af.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\am.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ar.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\bg.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\bn.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ca.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\cs.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\da.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\de.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\el.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\en-GB.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\en-US.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\es-419.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\es.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\et.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\fa.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\fi.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\fil.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\fr.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\gu.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\he.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\hi.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\hr.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\hu.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\id.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\it.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ja.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\kn.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ko.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\lt.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\lv.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ml.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\mr.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ms.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\nb.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\nl.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\pl.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\pt-BR.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\pt-PT.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ro.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ru.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\sk.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\sl.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\sr.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\sv.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\sw.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ta.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\te.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\th.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\tr.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\uk.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\ur.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\vi.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\zh-CN.pak"
  File "src\resources\locales\zh-TW.pak"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\resources"
  File "src\resources\resources.pak"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR"
  File "src\snapshot_blob.bin"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\styles"
  File "src\styles\qwindowsvistastyle.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR"
  File "src\v8_context_snapshot.bin"
  File "src\vk_swiftshader.dll"
  File "src\vk_swiftshader_icd.json"
  File "src\vulkan-1.dll"
SectionEnd

Section -AdditionalIcons
  ; WriteIniStr "$INSTDIR\${PRODUCT_NAME}.url" "InternetShortcut" "URL" "${PRODUCT_WEB_SITE}"
  ; CreateShortCut "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\Website.lnk" "$INSTDIR\${PRODUCT_NAME}.url"
  CreateShortCut "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\Uninstall.lnk" "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"
SectionEnd

Section -Post
  WriteUninstaller "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"
  WriteRegStr HKLM "${PRODUCT_DIR_REGKEY}" "" "$INSTDIR\cxClientX.exe"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "DisplayName" "$(^Name)"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "UninstallString" "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "DisplayIcon" "$INSTDIR\cxClientX.exe"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "DisplayVersion" "${PRODUCT_VERSION}"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "URLInfoAbout" "${PRODUCT_WEB_SITE}"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "Publisher" "${PRODUCT_PUBLISHER}"
SectionEnd


Function un.onUninstSuccess
  HideWindow
  MessageBox MB_ICONINFORMATION|MB_OK "$(^Name) 已成功地从你的计算机移除。"
FunctionEnd

Function un.onInit
  MessageBox MB_ICONQUESTION|MB_YESNO|MB_DEFBUTTON2 "你确实要完全移除 $(^Name) ，其及所有的组件？" IDYES +2
  Abort
FunctionEnd

Section Uninstall
  Delete "$INSTDIR\${PRODUCT_NAME}.url"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\vulkan-1.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\vk_swiftshader_icd.json"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\vk_swiftshader.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\v8_context_snapshot.bin"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\styles\qwindowsvistastyle.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\snapshot_blob.bin"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\resources.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\zh-TW.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\zh-CN.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\vi.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ur.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\uk.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\tr.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\th.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\te.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ta.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\sw.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\sv.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\sr.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\sl.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\sk.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ru.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ro.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\pt-PT.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\pt-BR.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\pl.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\nl.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\nb.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ms.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\mr.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ml.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\lv.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\lt.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ko.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\kn.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ja.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\it.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\id.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\hu.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\hr.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\hi.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\he.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\gu.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\fr.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\fil.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\fi.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\fa.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\et.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\es.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\es-419.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\en-US.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\en-GB.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\el.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\de.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\da.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\cs.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ca.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\bn.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\bg.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\ar.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\am.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\locales\af.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\chrome_200_percent.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\resources\chrome_100_percent.pak"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Widgets.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Svg.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Gui.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Core.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\platforms\qwindows.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\opengl32sw.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\libGLESv2.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\libEGL.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\libcef.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qwebp.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qwbmp.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qtiff.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qtga.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qsvg.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qjpeg.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qico.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qicns.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\imageformats\qgif.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\icudtl.dat"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\iconengines\qsvgicon.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\d3dcompiler_47.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\chrome_elf.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\conf.json"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\CefViewWing.exe"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\cxClientX.exe"

  Delete "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\Uninstall.lnk"
  Delete "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\Website.lnk"
  Delete "$DESKTOP\畅写文档.lnk"
  Delete "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\畅写文档.lnk"

  RMDir "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档"
  ; 递归删除
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\DawnCache\"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\GPUCache\"
  RMDir "$INSTDIR\styles"
  RMDir "$INSTDIR\resources\locales"
  RMDir "$INSTDIR\resources"
  RMDir "$INSTDIR\platforms"
  RMDir "$INSTDIR\imageformats"
  RMDir "$INSTDIR\iconengines"
  RMDir "$INSTDIR"

  DeleteRegKey ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}"
  DeleteRegKey HKLM "${PRODUCT_DIR_REGKEY}"
  SetAutoClose true
SectionEnd
```

需要注意的地方：
图片需要为 bmp 格式，且尺寸有要求。


> [NSIS 用户手册](https://www.nsisfans.com/help/index.html)
